name: hablar
description: A JavaScript library useful for compiling i18n translations in a custom language to JavaScript functions.

scripts.jison: jison src/parsers/grammars/constraint.jison -m commonjs -o src/parsers/grammars/constraint.js && jison src/parsers/grammars/expression.jison -m commonjs -o src/parsers/grammars/expression.js && jison src/parsers/grammars/text.jison -m commonjs -o src/parsers/grammars/text.js
scripts.build: rm -rf lib/ && tsc -p . && npm run jison && mkdir lib/parsers/grammars && cp src/parsers/grammars/*.js lib/parsers/grammars
scripts.prepublish: npm run verify && npm run build

author: Kaare Hoff Skovgaard <khs@secoya.dk>
